## About

This site is a hub for the [Digital Scholarship Graduate Fellows Program](https://digitalscholarship.blogs.brynmawr.edu/dsgf/) at Bryn Mawr College, AY 2025-2026. The program is led by Alice McGrath (Senior Digital Scholarship Specialist) and Jeff Hopkins (Educational Technology Specialist).
